FormFields.SQL: SELECT F."ID", F."ID_Form", F."ID_Parent", F."Order", F."Type", F."DataType", F."Validation", F."isMandatory", F."Dependency", F."Field", IsNull(dbo.GetProcedureVarValues(F."Values"), F."Values") AS "Values", F."Html", F."Style", CASE WHEN IsNull(F."Field", '') = '' THEN '' ELSE IsNull(dbo.GetProcedureVariable(@prm_ID_Procedure, F."Field"), '') END AS "Data" FROM "FormFields" F WHERE (F."ID_Form" = @prm_ID_Form) AND (F."ID" = @prm_ID)
